Vectorized LIKE UDF optimization
Iceberg: Bucket partition transform with DECIMAL can throw NPE
Issues with staging dirs with materialized views on HDFS encrypted table
Iceberg: Concurrent queries fail during commit with ValidationException

NullPointerException is thrown when checking column uniqueness

Iceberg: Reading *Files Metadata table files if the column is of TIMESTAMP type
OOM/slow compilation when query contains SELECT clauses with nested expressions

Iceberg: Stats: IllegalStateException Invalid file: file length 0
After HIVE-27492 fix, some HPLSQL built-in functions like trim, lower are not working when used in insert statement.
Exception when querying JDBC tables with Hive/DB column types mismatch
Materialized view with aggregate function incorrectly shows it allows incremental rebuild
Iceberg: Concurrent Insert and IOW produce incorrect result
Fix example output of UDFHex
GroupByOperator may throw NullPointerException when setting data skew optimization parameters
Investigate TestJdbcWithMiniHS2.testParallelCompilation3 random failure
Pushdown Date data type to metastore via direct sql / JDO
Driver.isValidTxnListState should rely on global txn list
Insert with partition value containing colon and space is creating partition having wrong value
Remove netty transitive dependencies from hcatalog and hbase pom files to avoid CVEs
Add epoch time in the information_schema.scheduled_executions view
ACID: Pick the compactor transaction over insert dir
ORDER BY colName DESC does not honour 'hive.default.nulls.last' property in absence of NULLS_LAST/FIRST
AlterTableSetOwnerAnalyzer should send Hive Privilege Objects for Authorization.
JdbcStorageHandler Create table fails when hive.sql.schema is specified and is not the default one
JsonSerDe: Unable to read the string value from a nested json
When the default engine of the hiveserver is MR and the tez engine is set by the client, the client TEZ progress log cannot be printed normally
Cast as Date for invalid date produce the valid output
Map partition key columns when pushing TNK op through select
UpdateMDatabaseURI does not update managed location URI
CBO: Query fails after multiple count distinct rewrite
Map side SMB join is producing wrong result
ObjectStore.cleanWriteNotificationEvents and ObjectStore.cleanupEvents OutOfMemory on large number of pending events
Vectorization: Decimal64 division with integer columns
Enable flaky test TestReplicationScenariosAcidTablesBootstrap.testBootstrapAcidTablesDuringIncrementalWithConcurrentWrites.
Some of the HMS auth LDAP hive config names do not start with "hive."
PreUpgradeTool can fail because access to CharsetDecoder is not synchronized
Eliminate file rename in compactor
Fix invalid repo url in pom
Fix wrong results/ArrayOutOfBound exception in left outer map joins on specific boundary conditions with limit
CTLV with user specified location is not honoured
LLAP: Pool of column vector buffers can cause memory pressure
Llap query on external table with header or footer returns incorrect row count.
Vectorized LENGTH UDF doesn't respect the max length of VARCHAR or CHAR in Hive 3+
NPE in Hive Proto Logger
Calcite Rule HiveExpandDistinctAggregatesRule seems throwing IndexOutOfBoundsException
Fix autoColumnStats tests to make auto stats gather possible.
Autogather stats doesn't work when SDPO (sort dynamic partition optimization) is ON
Disable org.apache.hive.jdbc.miniHS2.TestHs2ConnectionMetricsHttp.testOpenConnectionMetrics
BloomKFilter: Avoid using the local byte[] arrays entirely
LLAP reader changes for decimal 64
Make a UDAF 'collect_set' work with complex types, even when map-side aggregation is disabled.
Outdated MetastoreSchemaTool class reference in schemaTool.sh
Manual import of mysql schema upgrade file fails
Hive should not push partition columns to the Parquet predicate, even if the data file contains the partition column
Attributes not removed from org.apache.hadoop.hive.common.metrics.MetricsMBeanImpl
Ban commons-logging (again)
Warning regarding multiple MOVE triggers is logged even if conflicting triggers are both KILL
